Uses of Class
org.fluentjdbc.DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder

  • Packages that use DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.fluentjdbc
    Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

    • Uses of DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

      Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.join​(List<String> leftFields, DbContextTableAlias joinedTable, List<String> rightFields)
      Adds an additional table to the join as an inner join.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.join​(DatabaseColumnReference a, DatabaseColumnReference b)
      Adds an additional table to the join as an inner join.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextTableAlias.join​(List<String> leftFields, DbContextTableAlias joinedTable, List<String> rightFields)
      Create a new DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder based on this table by joining the specified joinedTable on all fields
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextTableAlias.join​(DatabaseColumnReference a, DatabaseColumnReference b)
      Create a new DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder based on this table by joining the specified DatabaseColumnReference
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.leftJoin​(List<String> leftFields, DbContextTableAlias joinedTable, List<String> rightFields)
      Adds an additional table to the join as a left join.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.leftJoin​(DatabaseColumnReference a, DatabaseColumnReference b)
      Adds an additional table to the join as a left join.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextTableAlias.leftJoin​(List<String> leftFields, DbContextTableAlias joinedTable, List<String> rightFields)
      Create a new DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder based on this table by left joining the specified joinedTable on all fields
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextTableAlias.leftJoin​(DatabaseColumnReference a, DatabaseColumnReference b)
      Create a new DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder based on this table by left joining the specified DatabaseColumnReference.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.limit​(int rowCount)
      Adds FETCH ...
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.orderBy​(String orderByClause)
      Adds an order by clause to the query.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.orderBy​(DatabaseColumnReference column)
      Adds an order by clause to the query.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.query()
      Returns or creates a query object to be used to add DatabaseQueryable.where(String, Object) statements and operations
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextTableAlias.select()
      Create a new DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.skipAndLimit​(int offset, int rowCount)
      Adds OFFSET ...
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.unordered()
      If you haven't called orderBy(java.lang.String), the results of DatabaseListableQueryBuilder.list(java.sql.Connection, org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseResult.RowMapper<OBJECT>) will be unpredictable.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextTableAlias.where​(String fieldName, Object value)
      Create a new DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder with the specified query
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.whereAll​(List<String> fields, List<Object> values)
      For each field adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.whereExpression​(String expression)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.whereExpression​(String expression, Object parameter)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.whereExpressionWithParameterList​(String expression, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.whereIn​(String fieldName, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName in (?, ?, ?)" to the query.
      DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder.whereOptional​(String fieldName, Object value)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query unless value is null
